entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
